name: The Devil House
description:
Suffer in the Devil House

Your goal is simple, solve the puzzles and get out of the house, but strange things will happen and chase you until you DIE!

Interact - left click     -       Move - WASD
Inventory - Tab            -       Flashlight - F
Crouch - Ctrl                 -       Sprint - Shift

Minimum system requirements:

CPU: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent
Memory:  8 GB RAM
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R9 270 
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 2 GB

Recommended system requirements:
CPU: Intel Core i5-2500 or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon RX 550
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 2 GB
